repos_data.description: Multi-platform auto-proxy client, supporting Sing-box, X-ray, TUIC, Hysteria, Reality, Trojan, SSH etc. It’s an open-source, secure and ad-free.
一个支持节点与订阅链接的 Linux 命令行代理工具 | A command-line tool for one-click proxy in your research and development without installing v2ray or anything else (only for linux)
